mapper.select: SELECT T.TIME_NO, T.MOVIE_NO, M.MOVIENM, T.THEATER_NO, T.TIME_DATE, T.TIME_START, T.TIME_END, T.SE_NO, S.THEATERCITY, S.THEATERTOWN, S.THEATERGWAN, S.THEATERROOMSEAT, A.SE_NO1, A.SE_NO2, A.SE_NO3, A.SE_NO4 FROM TIMETABLE T , MOVIE M, THEATER S, SEAT A WHERE T.MOVIE_NO = M.MOVIECD AND T.THEATER_NO = S.THEATERNO AND T.SE_NO = A.SE_NO
